item.title: Getting Started With LLVM (1)
item.description: Why should I learn LLVM? According to ChatGPT, there are several reasons why you should learn the LLVM compiler framework: Popularity: LLVM is widely used in the industry, making it an important skill for those working in software development or computer science. Versatility: LLVM can be used for a wide range of programming languages, making it a valuable tool for those who work with multiple languages. Performance: LLVM is known for its high-performance code generation, making it a valuable tool for optimizing software applications.

item.title: The Remaking of My Blog with Hugo
item.description: The remaking I have not blogged since I joined Amazon in 2016. My initial focus was delivery results and then I had to deal with a massive volume of customer interactions and data as the result. Now I want to blog again as I spend significant time doing R&D at AWS Center for Quantum Computing and I need to capture what I learnt, and hopefully that benefits others as well. My original blog site was developed on github pages using Jekyll.
